Quick Start

Experience the Three Pillars in 30 Seconds

Transform your AI agent into a intelligent workflow orchestrator with just three simple steps

1

Add Anubis to Your MCP Config

Add this configuration to your AI agent's MCP settings: 

{
  "mcpServers": {
    "anubis": {
      "command": "npx",
      "args": ["-y", "@hive-academy/anubis"]
    }
  }
}

Works with Cursor, Copilot, Roocode, and Kilocode

2

Initialize Intelligent Guidance

Tell your AI agent to activate Anubis workflow rules:

"Please initialize Anubis workflow rules for cursor by calling the init_rules MCP tool"
